channel.title: I need help with a server i got
channel.description: Sooo.... Im using xcell scape and evolutionX client. I searched through the files like the compiler and runserver and couldn find anything about the version of java they were using but i found the port, and it was 43594, i use that. But i scrolled tot he bottom and saw a file named vole. it showed the version of java. It was 11. i had 20 and 21 and changed it to that and ran the compiler. The compiler said i needed to install java? so i went to java and installed 6u11. So i compiled it and it said the same thing, i just ran the server and when i walked around alot or clicked on an action it closed out. Could someone help? and yes i changed the version back to 11. -Thx Tarridon

item.description:

Could not find process: java

Online.

item.source: I need help with a server i got

item.title: I need help with a server i got
item.dc:creator: @bluescapepkz bluescapepkz
item.description:
@bluescapepkz wrote:

You need to creat a path to your java.
Open start, search “edit the system environment variables”.
Then click environment variables. something will pop up.

there are two options that say “new”. Choose the first one.
It should ask for variable name next. For variable name put in “path”
for variable value put in the location of your jdk. It’s usually located at C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin

*note do not type the " ".

Please inform me if i’ve helped

Read full topic
